1561064.owner: Office of the Regional Vice Pres (EAPVP)

abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of: (i) the
            installation of a fourth thermal unit of 375 MW capacity at
            the existing Talin plant in Southern Taiwan. The first 300
            MW unit is in operation; the second (also 300 MW) is
            expected to be in service by the middle of 1970 and the
            third (375 MW) is in the process of being ordered.
            Installation of the fourth unit would be completed in late
            1973. (ii) The addition of two 90 MW generators at the Lower
            Tachien hydroelectric station which is about 40 km
            downstream from the site of the Bank-financed Tachien
            Hydroelectric project. Two 90 MW units at the Lower Tachien
            station are scheduled to be placed in service during the
            course of this year. The two additional units would be in
            service by December 1972. (iii) The provision of 345 kV
            transmission facilities for the additional generating capacity.
